responses: Hi there, how can I help?

Daniel's the name! Donuts are the game!

patterns: could i get something to eat
responses: We sell donuts, freshly made every morning!
We have a wonderful selection of specialty donuts, as well as our signature original glazed donuts.
We are open 8:00am to 6:00pm on weekdays and 8:00am to 9:00pm on weekends!

patterns: how much does a donut cost
what is the cost of a donut
what is the price of a donut
how much for a dozen donuts?
responses:
Original - Single: $1.00 / Dozen: $10.00 
     Specialty - Single: $2.00 / Dozen: $16.00

patterns: What specialty donuts do you have?
responses:
Our specialty donuts are: chocolate glazed, vanilla glazed, strawberry glazed with sprinkles, oreo, reese's peanut butter, honey cruller.
     And we of course have our signature original glazed donuts!

patterns: Which donut do you like the best?
responses: My favourite is the oreo donut, but you can never go wrong with our original glazed!
All of our donuts are nut free!
All of our donuts are 100% nut free!
